page.title: 16LILLESHALL&CH.ASTON CHURCHES
page.content: The{2 Churches}are at the centre of the villages of{Church Aston}and {Lilleshall}.Both clergymen live near the churches in modern houses.Each has a{Church Hall,Choir and Bells.Church {Aston}has a{Sunday School}at 10.30 but {Lilleshall}has{Pathfinders}instead on Thursday evenings 6-7 p.m. {Services - St.Andrew's Church Aston. Sun. 9.00 Holy Communion. 10.30 Parish Communion. 4.00 Evensong (Winter) 6.30 Evensong (Summer) Wed. 9.30 Holy Communion. 2.00 Pram Service (fort). 6.30 Choir Practice. {St.Michael's,Lilleshall. Sun 8.30 Holy Communion. 10.45 Family Service. 6.30 Evensong. Wed 10.00 Holy Communion.
